data.introduce: OrderCancel接口可用来完成取消订单、废票及退票操作。
data.business:
目前支持的业务范围：
取消订单；
机票及EMD的废票；
机票及EMD的退票。
支持全服务航司及低成本航司。
不支持范围：
EMD的单独废票；
EMD的单独退票。
典型业务场景：废票
接口调用顺序：机票查询，验价，创建订单并出票（延迟支付），取消订单退票（未超过24点）
1. AirShoppingRQ / AirShoppingRS
2. OfferPriceRQ / OfferPriceRS
3. OrderCreateRQ/ OrderViewRS
4. OrderChangeRQ(with FOP) / OrderViewRS
5.OrderCancelRQ/OrderCancelRS
废票实例： EMBED   \* MERGEFORMAT 
典型业务场景：退票
接口调用顺序：机票查询，验价，创建订单并出票（延迟支付），取消订单退票（超过24点）
1. AirShoppingRQ / AirShoppingRS
2. OfferPriceRQ / OfferPriceRS
3. OrderCreateRQ/ OrderViewRS
4. OrderChangeRQ(with FOP) / OrderViewRS
5.OrderReshopRQ/OrderReshopRS
6.OrderCancelRQ/OrderCancelRS
退票实例： EMBED   \* MERGEFORMAT
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"IATA_OrderCancelRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The OrderCancel transaction set requests the cancellation of a specified order, and returns confirmation of cancellation.","children":[{"name":"MessageDoc","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"NDC Message Document information.","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A name is a word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept","children":[]}]},{"name":"Party","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Message/ Transaction Party(s) information. Note that information about parties is intended for business use, it is not intended for transaction authentication and routing of the message.","children":[{"name":"Sender","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Information related to the party sending this message.","children":[{"name":"TravelAgency","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A private retailer or public service that provides travel and tourism related services to the public on behalf of suppliers such as activities, airlines, car rentals, cruise lines, hotels, railways, travel insurance, and package tours.","children":[{"name":"AgencyID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"PayloadAttributes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"IATA标准有效载荷属性。","children":[{"name":"TrxID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"报文追踪唯一标识ID","children":[]},{"name":"VersionNumber","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"NDC版本号","children":[]}]},{"name":"PointOfSale","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Information identifying the location and other attributes of the entity performing transactions. Order supports the sale of a flexible range of airline products and services that are not necessarily Journey b","children":[{"name":"OrderID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"OwnerCode","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Either the IATA-defined 2-character code or the ICAO-defined 3-character code of an airline, as per the length of the value.","children":[]}]},{"name":"OrderCancelProcessing","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票类型","children":[{"name":"ReasonCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"退票类型代码","children":[]}]}]}]}]
